New Records: Fakhar Zaman scored 81 runs, the highest for Pakistan in the match
Key Match Events: Fakhar Zaman and Mohammad Rizwan formed a significant partnership
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan captain Babar Azam emphasized the team's focus and preparation
Bangladesh captain Shakib al-Hasan discussed the team's batting performance and strategy
Post-Match Reflections: Bangladesh captain Shakib al-Hasan expressed disappointment with the batting performance
Pakistan captain Babar Azam reflected on the team's resilience and future goals
